boolean validTime = hour > this.stationTime.getHour() || hour == this.stationTime.getHour() && minute > this.stationTime.getMinute();

this.trainDepartures = this.trainDepartures
         .entrySet()
         .stream()
         .filter(
            d -> d.getValue().getDepartureTime().combine(d.getValue().getDepartureTime()).getHour() > this.stationTime.getHour()
               || d.getValue().getDepartureTime().combine(d.getValue().getDelay()).getHour() == this.stationTime.getHour()
                  && d.getValue().getDepartureTime().combine(d.getValue().getDelay()).getMinute() >= this.stationTime.getMinute()
         )
         .collect(Collectors.toMap(Entry::getKey, Entry::getValue, (prev, next) -> next, HashMap::new));

return !(o instanceof TrainDeparture that)
            ? false
            : this.getTrack() == that.getTrack()
               && this.getTrainNumber() == that.getTrainNumber()
               && Objects.equals(this.getDepartureTime(), that.getDepartureTime())
               && Objects.equals(this.getDelay(), that.getDelay())
               && Objects.equals(this.getLine(), that.getLine())
               && Objects.equals(this.getDestination(), that.getDestination());
return Objects.hash(this.getDepartureTime(), this.getDelay(), this.getLine(), this.getDestination(), this.getTrack(), this.getTrainNumber());
